content.html: Stop making podcasts about news and discourse and history. We have enough of those. Stop. We get it. How about a podcast where guests come on and talk about their pets, their quirks and treats and tricks. Learn about a new little guy every week.
content.value:
Stop making podcasts about news and discourse and history. We have enough of those. Stop. We get it.

How about a podcast where guests come on and talk about their pets, their quirks and treats and tricks. Learn about a new little guy every week.
